caption.p: Key clinical characteristics of patients in the Quebec Parkinson Network cohort. Data are presented for the 1070 patients with PD, except the following for which data were not available for all patients: age at symptom onset ( n = 518), age at diagnosis ( n = 921), modified Hoehn and Yahr stage ( n = 637), postural instability ( n = 697), tremor as presenting symptom ( n = 863), rigidity as presenting symptom ( n = 748), bradykinesia as presenting symptom ( n = 787), and postural instability as presenting symptom ( n = 724).
